item.title: CVE-2023-47244|2024-08-02T21:09:36.043Z -- omnisend -- email%20marketing%20for%20woocommerce%20by%20omnisend
item.description: Exposure of Sensitive Information to an Unauthorized Actor vulnerability in Omnisend Email Marketing for WooCommerce by Omnisend.This issue affects Email Marketing for WooCommerce by Omnisend: from n/a through 1.13.8.
